title: Mystery at Fire Island
brief_description: It’s kids versus the criminals when the search for a missing friend uncovers an international plot! While vacationing on Fire Island, two young cousins risk danger to help find an old fisherman who has mysteriously disappeared. As the intrigue unfolds and the amateur sleuths find their way to solving the mystery we challenge you to do the same. Rated: G
